verses.name: Luke 8:52
verses.text: And all wept, and bewailed her: but he said, Weep not; she is not dead, but sleepeth.

verses.name: Luke 8:53
verses.text: And they laughed him to scorn, knowing that she was dead.

verses.name: Luke 8:54
verses.text: And he put them all out, and took her by the hand, and called, saying, Maid, arise.

verses.name: Luke 8:55
verses.text: And her spirit came again, and she arose straightway: and he commanded to give her meat.

verses.name: Luke 8:56
verses.text: And her parents were astonished: but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done.
